Deed of sale of immovable property worth Rs.11,47,000/- dated 27-12-2025. On the date, Kandelli Sivayya (age 35 years), son of Kandelli Krishna (Age 35 years), (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX), resident of Kandelli Butchayya (Age 54 years), (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX), resident of Kandelli Butchayya (Age 54 years), (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX), resident of Kandelli Butchayya (Age 54 years), resident of Kandelli Butchayya (Age 54 years), (Aadhaar No. XXXX XXXX XXXX), resident of Vadapalli village, Kovvur mandal, East Godavari district, to the effect that you are my son. With the intention of giving you possession of my immovable property, out of the love I have for you, and in return for that love, I have given you possession of the immovable property as per the schedule below, free of charge, without asking for any kind of consideration from you. Therefore, I hereby waive all rights I have in the said immovable property and hereby transfer the said rights to you and take possession of the said immovable property on this day itself. Kandelle Krishna

Therefore, from now on, you are the absolute rightful owner of the said property and you shall freely enjoy it with all the rights of your son, grandson, heir, heiress Whatever disputes may arise in the said property, whether by me, by my residents, by you, by your residents, I will settle them all at my own expense and will be able to execute the said property to you without any delay.

The said property is an undisputed immovable property, which is free from any encroachments,
the ward number, door number, limit, and boundaries are correct, this property is my ancestral property,
and has been inherited by me and has been in my complete possession and rightful possession up to this day,
and I entrust you with this deed of trust.

A notice is hereby filed for the registration of the said property in your name in the accounts of the Panchayat. The said property is not an assigned property as per A.P.9/77.

Declaration of the original title deeds of the property in the Scheduled Estate of this deed I/We have furnished all the necessary particulars like tax receipts, approvals from other government offices and encumbrance certificates for the immovable property and my/our identity documents issued by the government to the undersigned. I/We hereby certify that I/We have not made any transfers, alienations/registrations of the immovable property covered by these documents and that no one else has any right to transfer the Scheduled Immovable Property except me/us and hereby register this deed in the name of the undersigned for the Scheduled Immovable Property. I/We hereby certify that all the above information is true and I/We shall be fully responsible for any legal action or liability arising out of or in connection with this document, which is being registered on this day. Neither the Sub-Registrar, nor the staff of the office, nor the person who registered the document, nor the clerk who registered the document, nor the person Declaration of the undersigned
I/We hereby register this document with the original title deeds of the immovable property, tax receipts of the immovable property, other government approvals and encumbrance certificates issued by the government and I/We have personally seen and verified the above mentioned items by experienced persons.

The Sub-Registrar who registered this document, the office staff, the person who wrote and registered the document, the clerk who wrote and registered this document, and the clerk who wrote and registered the document, shall not have any relationship or responsibility in relation to this document written and registered on this day. sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 9570 of 2025, dated 27/Dec/2025, executed by Kandelli Krishna in favour of his son Kandelli Sivayya, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 192 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 5-27, comprised in survey number 212/1, Assessment No. 1147, Block 5, situated in Vadapalle Village & Panchayat, Kovvuru Mandal, within the District of East Godavari registered at sub-registrar office Kovvur is bounded as follows: North by: House and Site of Undrajavarapu Wilson, 48 Sq. Ft South by: Panchayat Road, 48 Sq. Ft East by: House and Site of Koripalli Chantiyya, 36 Sq. Ft West by: Property of Others, 36 Sq. Ft
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
